data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Nii é loozu é zoloo guye wooi ma, nii daa ga: «Mina koloɠolo!» Davide ná-guyei.
Gaamazu, wa tukpɔi ɠaaleʋe ga maaɠɛkpɔgi?58:2 Gaamazu, wa tukpɔi ɠaaleʋe ga maaɠɛkpɔgi?: Tati pelei taɠili ɓalaa ka ga nii: Gaama ʋe ɓaa ga wɔi wo ga totuɠɔiti, wa telebodai ziɛzu?
Naa li poun! Wa telebotalai ɠɛɛzu ga kɛɛɠɛɛi!
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta yɛsu ti-lee ɠoozu ti ɠaka,
ma wanai ɠa ti ʋa eɠɛ kaaliiti,
é la woiloga pote nuiti ta-wuye wooi ma,
Niima nuiti ti ɲɛɛlɛ, eɠɛ ziɛiti ti yeizu!
Eɠɛ koe goi é ʋoolozu, a ɠɛna lia luɠɔ,
Aisa wa-laaɠoli liɠiiti ti ʋa ɓadi ga dɔɓɔ ɠaingiti ma abui,
Toɠa ga koozunɛ telebo nui ʋɛ, a faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti kaana ti ɗa zalai zɔlɔɔ.
